msubsection.title: singleinfo
msubsection.p: Similar to the info command with the difference that this one allows to request a specific information.

attribute.name: target
attribute.doc: Directory or file to gather the information about.

attribute.name: property
attribute.doc: The property that will be set. It will be set to an empty string if the information could not be gathered.

attribute.name: verbose
attribute.doc: Turns on verbosity for this task. Default is "false".

attribute.name: request
attribute.doc:
Specifies the information that has to be retrieved. Following values are supported:
path
name
url
repourl
repouuid
revision
nodekind
schedule
author
lastRevision
lastDate
lastTextUpdate
lastPropUpdate
checksum
